An invitation to Mr. John Garlick's house at the sign of the George in Love-Lane near Billingsgate, to the eating of a dish of meat, called a Spanish oleo Gibbs, Richard, 17th cent.
1 sheet ([2] p.).
Printed by J.R. for the author, London : 1683.
In verse. Signed at end: Richard Gibbs. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
=======
